definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)

sentences.english: Event cards represent shifts in the world order of Vigil.
sentences.chinese: 將代表着祈夜世界秩序的輪換。

sentences.english: If we do the work turn and turn about, we can finish it quickly.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們輪換着做這個工作，我們能很快地把它完成。

sentences.english: Arrigoni: Against Milan A Great Result "The turnover is working well."
sentences.chinese: 對陣米蘭這是一個偉大的結果“輪換制工作的不錯。”

sentences.english: The soldiers posted abroad in 2001 rotated home last year.
sentences.chinese: 2001年派駐國外的士兵去年輪換調防回國。

sentences.english: Working as a journalist at ITN meant regular two-week spells of night shifts.
sentences.chinese: 在ITN當記者意味着有規律的爲期兩週的夜班輪換。

sentences.english: Everyone will be able to rest in turns, including Pato .
sentences.chinese: 每個人都可能會輪換，包括帕託。

sentences.english: The troops stationed along the border three years ago have been rotated back to their original positions.
sentences.chinese: 三年前派駐在邊境的部隊現已輪換調防原地。
結對編程並且經常輪換結對夥伴是需要紀律性的。

sentences.english: Depending on the toggle element selected, the content is rotated in the desired direction.
sentences.chinese: 當進行切換時，內容就向所選的方向輪換了。

sentences.english: The workers in this workshop do day and night shifts in weekly rotation.
sentences.chinese: 這個車間的工人上白班和上夜班每週輪換一次。

sentences.english: Many of the divisions have been continuously in action since the landing without any spell of relief.
sentences.chinese: 許多師團在登陸後連續作戰，而沒有任何輪換的機會。

sentences.english: Each team plays each other once, with home advantage alternating on a yearly basis.
sentences.chinese: 每年各隊互相交手一次，主場則是每年輪換一次。

sentences.english: Perhaps the biggest intrigue will center on how Krzyzewski constructs the rotation.
sentences.chinese: 也許，最大的祕密還在於沙舍夫斯基的輪換陣容。

sentences.english: Detroit Pistons Stuckey and Maxiell should become bigger part of the rotation.
sentences.chinese: 斯塔基賀賀麥克希爾應該成爲輪換陣容重的重要部分。

sentences.english: In state-controlled companies, senior managers are rotated at the behest of government.
sentences.chinese: 國家控股公司的高層聽從政府命令進行輪換。

sentences.english: He was so excited, he hopped from foot to foot.
sentences.chinese: 他興奮地兩隻腳輪換着單腳跳。

definition: St Paul/São Paulo, city in Brazil
competition schedule/the course of a race
to take up a challenge/to face an attack and meet it
